short_summary: Rebuild passenger-operated cableway for discharge data production
description: The project involves the construction of a new passenger-operated cableway at the Clearwater River near Dovercourt. The objective is to provide a reliable system for the production of discharge data while minimizing environmental impact. The specified location is 16 km south of Rocky Mountain House, Alberta.",
full_summary:
clearwater
==

**Tender Title**
----------------

Clearwater River Near Dovercourt – 05DB006 – Alberta - Passenger-Operated Cableway Rebuild

**Solicitation Number**: 5000076091
**Publication Date**: 2023-11-02
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-22T18:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-11-27
**Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

**Tender Description**
--------------------

The Water Survey of Canada, a division of Environment and Climate Change Canada, solicits tenders for the reconstruction of a passenger-operated cableway at the Clearwater River near Dovercourt hydrometric station (05DB006). This project aims to upgrade the existing infrastructure to ensure continuous data collection and operation safety.

The successful bidder will be responsible for designing and constructing a new passenger-operated cableway in accordance with applicable guidelines and standards. The site is located in Alberta, approximately 16 kilometers south of Rocky Mountain House. The scope of work is expected to be completed within 14 weeks.

**Key Requirements**
-----------------

* Design and construction of a passenger-operated cableway
* Compliance with applicable guidelines and standards
* Minimal environmental impact
* Completion of work within 14 weeks
* Subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**
--------------------

Helena Lee
helena.lee@ec.gc.ca
(778) 617-2275
